ygData.subject: Re: Question about Augmentation and Rune series.  Also Feedback.
ygData.msgSnippet: At 01:07 PM 7/12/99 -0700, you wrote: It s spelled Sylverlokk, and yes I m on E ci, only level 29 though. I will test them when I can, If they don t stack
ygData.messageBody:
At 01:07 PM 7/12/99 -0700, you wrote:

It's spelled Sylverlokk, and yes I'm on E'ci, only level 29 though.
I will test them when I can, If they don't stack thats a bug it seems to me
and should be bugged and feedbacked.
Can you give me some details about feedback like how much mana it costs and
what it does?


>From: "Jeff Wilkinson" <wilkie@...>
>
>Is it just me or do these not stack. I was trying to cast Rune II last
>night with Augmentation on and noticed I was not getting a Icon for Rune II.
>I hope that maybe I was bugged lastnight because it doesn't seem right that
>they dont stack. One is a damage shield and the other is a Agi buff. Any
>one knowing anything about this please let me know.
>
>Has Feedback been fixed yet I know there was a problem if the MOB died by
>Feedback the corpse disappeared.
>
>SilverLock I was wondering is that the name of your character on EC'I? I
>dont ever remember seeing you around there I keep track of most of the
>higher level enchanters and know most of them.
>
>Thanks for your time all.
>
>
>Kryten Emohawk of Ec'i
>
